participant_1.background: i volunteer my time with a local bunny rescue. my favorite color is navy blue. i work fulltime in a shipyard. i donate a part of my salary to charity each month.

participant_2.background: i don't drink alcohol. i enjoy mountain biking as a hobby. my father was a construction worker. i hate the color pink. i'm a huge coffee lover.

content.text: hi, just having a coffee, what are you doing?
hi, I just got back from work. what do you do for work?
I'm a construction worker. My father was a construction worker too
I work in construction. do you have a favorite color? mine is navy
I don't have a favourite color but I do hate pink
pink is my favorite. do you work? I work with my bunny rescue
bunny rescue, that's quite a hobby. I do mountain biking, my job probably isn't physically strenuous engough
I do not have time for mountain biking. I volunteer in a local shipyard
you seem busy. better than hanging around and drinking
I do. do you like to charity? I volunteer with my local bunny
